name: Where the water flows...
description:
This is a game made for the secret santa jam 2022. My giftee said that he liked games that make the player feel refreshed after playing them, so I tried to make some kind of "Zen Game" where you can paint a river and get points for reaching as many people (houses) as possible.

Sadly I wasn't really I able to complete it, so it's right now you can only draw a river on a small hex grid. I will probably continue working on it in the future.

My main inspirations where Townscaper and Dorfromantik and everything in the game was created by me during the jam.
